name: BIRFIA (itch)
description:
Birfia is a Local Multiplayer Fighting Game for 2 - 6 players, who will be divided into teams and fight each other with punch, water guns, and other special weapons! 

Winning conditions: 1. Escort the payload  that is filled with bombs to your opponent's home by making sure only your team is standing near the payload. 2. Bring back your food and put them inside the basket that matches your team's color.
